items.summary: Ensure the homepage banner carousel auto-slides (autoplays) by default when there are 2+ banner images configured, while keeping existing pause-on-user-interaction behavior (hover/focus/touch interaction should pause and manual next/previous controls should still work).

Remove the word "delivery" from all user-facing website copy and replace it with service-appropriate wording in English (use "on-time service" and/or "on-time setup" depending on context), ensuring the site reads like a service website.
